services.title: FRONT-END WEB DEVELOPMENT
services.description: Application development in React is my specialty. Recently, I have also become a big fan of one-way data flows, Redux-like architectures, as well as typed programming languages like TypeScript.

services.title: BACK-END WEB DEVELOPMENT
services.description: In back-end development, my current stack involves Flask, NodeJS and PHP. MySQL and MongoDB are DBMS technology that have used on the projects i have worked on

about.title: Designer & Developer Based Out Of Nairobi
about.description: Iâ€™m a software developer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. In my career, I've always sought out meaningful challenges and opportunities. As a web developer, I use my attention to detail, passion for making things, and dedication to change the world through my work. That's why I'm looking forward to making an impact at a high-growth company.
